text: The 2015 season was Helsingin Jalkapalloklubi's 107th competitive season. HJK is the most successful football club in Finland with 27 Finnish Championships, 12 Finnish Cup titles, 5 Finnish League Cup titles, one appearance in the UEFA Champions League group stages and one appearance in the UEFA Europa League group stages.http://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/season=1998/clubs/index.htmlhttp://www.uefa.com/uefaeuropaleague/season=2015/clubs/index.html As Veikkausliiga 2014 champions, HJK entered the 2015–16 UEFA Champions League second qualifying round. The Under-19 team, including several players from Klubi-04 participated in the 2015–16 UEFA Youth League. ==Squad== As of September 1, 2015.
